title: Next Ultimate Skin?
body:
You know, it's almost been a whole year since Spirit Guard Udyr (yeah, I know), and it's about that time of year for the next one to come in the pipeline. 

I'd particularly like one of the League's fine ladies (support maybe) to have a pimped out look for us to ~~waste~~***cough*** spend our money on. So if any rioters want to drop any infuriatingly vague hints about it, I'm all ears.

replies.body:
Well, I read this on another post, which I think is worth sharing: The two Ultimate skins, Pulsefire Ezreal and Spirit Guard Udyr, are for champions that share a name with a member of the Riot staff. (Bot Riot Ezreal and Riot Udyr are employees at Riot. 

More champions under these circumstances are:

* Veigar
* Tryndamere
* Ryze
* Volibear ("Volibar")
* Zileas ("Zileas")

It is likely these champs are getting looked at for ultimate skin opportunities.

Popularity has little to do with ultimate skins. At least, prior to their release.

Before Pulsefire, *no one* played Ezreal. The top rated guide for him on Solomid.net started off by saying that playing Ez was probably not something you should do if you wanted to win. His W was considered a joke of an ability that wasn't even worth putting a single point into. Come PFE, people started playing him, and realized that the massive attack speed debuff and huge width of his W made him the best and safest duelist amongst all ADCs, and he's been doing pretty well for himself ever since.

Spirit Guard Udyr hasn't resurrected Udyr's popularity to quite the same extent as PFE did for Ez, but it still gave the languishing Udyr quite a jolt. He was a natural fit for an ultimate skin, I think.
